replies.bodyText: We made this class final. How do customer make use of the policy?
replies.author: sima-zhu

replies.bodyText:
They may want to create their own pipeline and code such as this:
HttpPipeline myCustomSearchPipeline = new HttpPipelineBuilder()
    .addPolicy(new SearchApiKeyPipelinePolicy(myCredentials)
    .addPolicy(myOtherPolicies)
    .build()
This is completely allowed and in some cases expected for a customer to roll their own custom pipeline to handle specific cases they want to cover, remove policies our builders add that they don't want, etc.
replies.author: alzimmermsft
